Introducing Substack Video Downloader, a user-friendly browser extension designed to make downloading videos from Substack newsletters effortless. With just a few clicks, you can save your favorite Substack videos for offline viewing, research, or sharing, all without the hassle of third-party apps or complicated software.Substack Video Downloader is the perfect tool to enhance your Substack experience by allowing easy and direct access to videos right from your browser.

How to Use:

1.  Install the Extension: Add Substack Video Downloader to your browser.
2.  Access the Extension: Click on the extension icon at the top right of your browser.
3.  Download the Video: Select "Download Video" from the extension menu. The video will open in a new tab.
4.  Save the Video: Click on the three dots in the video player and select "Download". The video will be saved as an MP4 file in your downloads folder.
5.  Rename and Save: Change the name of the file if desired and save it.
